abstract: Frank Bruni Op-Ed column lauds resurgence of Detroit as restaurants and other entrepreneurial activity in city surge forward despite recession and corruption; argues Detroit's fighting spirit funds its resilience and its fortunes reflect America's; portrays federal judge Terrence Berg, shooting victim who refused to abandon his urban neighborhood, as epitome of city's hope and promise.
lead_paragraph: We’re all invested in this city, a reflection of our neglect and a referendum on our resilience

headline.main: The Spirit and Promise of Detroit
headline.print_headline: The Spirit and Promise of Detroit
